title: I Will Die if I Don’t Gain Affection From the Male Lead - Novel Updates
genre: Josei   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Cold Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Slow Romance   System Administrator   Transmigration
author: Shanhu Shu   珊瑚树
description:
In a novel with Rebirth as genre, the male protagonist Lin Yu is cold and noble, abstinent and self-sufficient.

He is a talented musician who turned out to be a little bit crazy.

It is a pity that such person was accidentally killed because a b*tch caused him to be in a car accident.

After being reborn, the first thing Lin Yu did was to kill that b*tch who caused his death and Xu Tianzi transmigrated as that b*tch, but she received a sudden notification from a system.

System: [Ding——! This is the world of romance, Throwing sweet words: life value↑

Scattering displeasing words: life value↓

Your life balance is insufficient, please recharge with Lin Yu’s affection. ]
Xu Tianzi: “……???”>
